verbs.description: [ARG0: isolated and unseen yemenis] [V: eat] [ARG1: leaves] [ARGM-PRP: to stave off famine] [ARGM-LOC: in a remote pocket of northern yemen] many families with starving children have nothing to eat but the leaves of a local vine boiled into a sour acidic green paste hajjah zahra halas walid al shamshan famine un aslam aslam health center yemen aslam district
